channel.title: Fire cape: Unequipable?

item.title: Fire cape: Unequipable?
item.dc:creator: @caswell61 caswell61
item.description:
@caswell61 wrote:

I cant equip my fire cape on my server that I am creating.

I suck at coding tbh, but yaknow.
Tell me if there is something wrong with this that would cause this problem

if((playerHasItem(6570) || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 6570) && killedJad == 1){ deleteItem(6570, 1); playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1; playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 0; setEquipment(-1, 0,playerCape); }

Please help if you can!

Read full topic
